prop10mil.Name: 10 Million
prop10mil.Description: Enemy Denounce Their Form Of Government For Yours!

prop25mil.Name: 25 Million
prop25mil.Description: Of The Enemys Population Declare Allegiane to Your Country!

secret_riots.Name: Riots!
secret_riots.Description: Due to an unfortunate decision by a referee at a sports event, your enemys biggest city erupts in riots and they lose 10 million people.

secret_shoes.Name: Hoarder!
secret_shoes.Description: Your enemy is caught with 400 pairs of shoes in his wifes closet. 2 million barefoot natives disgustedly immigrate to your country

secret_time_travel.Name: Time Travel!
secret_time_travel.Description: Your scientists have learned the secret of time travel and although it is expensive YOU GET TWO TURNS IN A ROW

secret_lizard_monster.Name: Klodzilla!
secret_lizard_monster.Description: A giant lizard attacks your enemys biggest city. 5 million people are chewed up!

secret_rearm.Name: REARMAMENT!
secret_rearm.Description: You may (at your option) discard up to 7 cards from your hand (all at once) and immediately replace them from the deck.

secret_recall.Name: RECALL!
secret_recall.Description: Atomic Cannon manufacturer discovers defect - recalls all cannons. Anyone who has a face-up atomic cannon must discard it.

delivery_b70.Name: B-70 Bomber
delivery_b70.Description: Carries any combination of warheads up to 50 megatons

delivery_polaris.Name: Polaris
delivery_polaris.Description: Carries one warhead up to 10 megatons

special_coup.Name: Public Relations Coup
special_coup.Description: SAVE UNTIL NEEDED. This card will cancel out one PROPAGANDA card played against you
